servinfo.title: Precaution in Replacing Immobilizer Control Module (ICM)
servinfo.ptxt: After ICM is replaced with a new one or a used one, the engine cannot be started unless the transponder code in the transponder which is built in the ignition key is registered in ICM and the key verification code stored in ICM is registered in the immobilizer control system. For the registration procedure, refer to Procedure after Immobilizer Control Module (ICM) Replacement:Diesel Engine Model .
